This is a Pythonimplementation of `semantic-release`_ for JS by Stephan BÃ¶nnemann. Ifyou find this topic interesting you should check out his `talk fromJSConf Budapest`_.The general idea is to be able to detect what the next version of theproject should be based on the commits. This tool will use that toautomate the whole release, upload to an artifact repository and post changelogs toGitHub.
